TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendItem extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class LegendItem Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea

summary.span: 表示儲存於 類別的圖例項目。

span.span: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示的圖例項目，可以是預設或自訂項目：The class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - 預設的圖例項目會自動插入資料數列或資料點的圖例。Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points. 圓形圖和環圈圖的預設項目代表繪製的資料點，而所有其他圖表類型的項目表示繪製的數列。Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series. 根據預設，這些圖例項目會使用資料點或數列色彩符號色彩和數列或資料點的圖例項目文字的名稱。By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text. 可以自訂預設圖例項目，或刪除在執行階段使用事件控制項。Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the event of the control. - 自訂圖例項目有使用者定義的文字、 符號色彩等等。Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth. 不同於預設的項目，在未連線的繪製的資料。Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data. 自訂圖例項目可以加入在設計階段或執行的階段，使用屬性物件。Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the property of the object. 圖例符號可能是矩形、 線條或標記，取決於屬性設定為物件。Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the property setting of a object. 自訂圖例項目的文字由屬性。The text of a custom legend item is determined by the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 請注意，您也可以加入自訂圖例項目使用`Add`和`Insert`方法相關聯集合的屬性物件。Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the collection property of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public LegendItem (string name, System.Drawing.Color color, string image);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Drawing.Color color, string image) cil managed
public: LegendItem(System::String ^ name, System::Drawing::Color color, System::String ^ image);

span.span: The name of the legend item.
The color of the legend item.

param.name: image
param.span: 要用於顯示圖例項目的影像的路徑。

span.span: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、色彩和影像路徑，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, color and image path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有`image`或`color`參數必須指定。Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified. 如果同時指定`image`參數的優先順序。If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目背景漸層的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.

summary.span: 此外，也會判斷是否使用漸層。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否標題會顯示漸層，並用來判斷一個漸層的方向。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 如果這個屬性僅實作屬性設定為。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用屬性來設定次要色彩。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用此屬性來設定所需的漸層樣式。Use this property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.HatchStyleEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的影線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值會指定使用類型的筆刷的影線樣式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製的直線。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 如需可用影線樣式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 影線線條的色彩由屬性。The color of hatching lines is determined by the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackImageTransparentColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定繪製背景影像時，會被透明色彩取代的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 將以透明方式顯示的 值。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的輔色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.

value.span: 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是其中幾個相關的屬性，判斷次要背景色彩的許多物件; 套用漸層色彩時，才能使用。The property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied. 如果這個屬性僅實作屬性設定為。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 您可以設定任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影線，屬性會決定圖例項目的影線線條的色彩。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item. 要用於圖例資料格的背景漸層色彩：To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用屬性來設定次要色彩。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用屬性來設定所需的漸層樣式。Use the property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BorderColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的框線色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的自訂圖例項目使用的標記。If you use a marker for a custom legend item. 這個屬性會設定標記的框線色彩。this property will set the border color of the marker. 不過，如果屬性也設定，其值具有優先權。However, if the property is also set, its value has precedence. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle BorderDashStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的框線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.

value.span: 列舉值，決定圖例項目的框線樣式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定用於框線的線條樣式。This property determines the line style used for a border. 可以是實線、 虛線，等等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 其他的框線樣式，請參閱列舉主題。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BorderWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的框線寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of a legend item.

value.span: 決定寬度，以像素的圖例項目框線的值。

span.span: An value that determines the width, in pixels, of the legend item border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性也可用來設定線條的寬度，比方說，自訂圖例項目會顯示與樣式。The property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a style. **請注意**，這個值只適用於物件與的其中一個或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cells As LegendCellCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollectionEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得圖例項目中資料格的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of cells in the legend item.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖例項目包含一或多個圖例資料格，分別由物件，並儲存在。A legend item consists of one or more legend cells, each represented by a object and stored in a . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color Color { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這屬性是一個數個相關的屬性，取得或設定許多圖表元素的色彩，則可以將任何 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。This property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果資料點和其數列設定這個屬性，資料點色彩會最優先。If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence. 系列色彩只會用於資料點，無法定義自己的色彩。The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color. 如果自訂圖例項目使用的標記，此屬性將決定標記色彩。If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color. 不過，如果屬性設定，其值，則具有優先順序。However, if the property is set, its value then has precedence. 將會忽略這個屬性，如果屬性會指定要用於圖例項目符號的影像。This property will be ignored if the property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，指出是否已啟用圖例項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend item is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用圖例項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the legend item is enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Image { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示為圖例項目符號的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定要使用的影像檔符號。This property determines the image file to be used for the symbol. 路徑可以是絕對或相對 URL。The path can be an absolute or a relative URL. 如果您設定背景影像，該映像將會顯示不論屬性設定。If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the property setting. 設定屬性來啟用一種映像用來顯示為透明的色彩。Set the property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendImageStyle ImageStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendImageStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendImageStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目影像的顯示樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.
A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些樣式會判斷如何將顯示的項目對應的符號。These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed. A樣式可以結合樣式。A style can be combined with a style. 若要這麼做，先設定屬性。To accomplish this, first set the property to . 然後使用屬性來指定標記的影像，或屬性，以指定的標記樣式。Then use the property to specify a marker image, or the property to specify a marker style. 產生的符號將會是一條線是影像或標記的組合。The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Legend As Legend

summary.span: 取得或設定與這個圖例項目相關聯的 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object associated with this legend item.
A object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MapAreaAttributes { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的對應區域屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the map area attributes of a legend item.

value.span: 值，表示圖例項目對應區域的屬性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of corresponding map area for the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定屬性，會自動建立用戶端影像地圖。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 對應區域也會建立，並將其附加至的屬性字串\<對應 > 對應至這個屬性要設定的圖表物件的標記。A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the chart object for which this property is being set. 例如，設定使用這個屬性的目標屬性和的第一個資料點的屬性會產生類似下列程式碼的 HTML 程式碼：For example, setting the Target attribute using this property and the property of the first data point will result in HTML code that is similar to the following code: \...\\\\...\\\ 因為整個字串會附加到\<對應 > 標記，應該以空格分隔多個屬性。Because the entire string is appended to the \ tag, multiple attributes should be separated with a space. 屬性可以用於搭配屬性來指定對應區域屬性，例如，目標 = _blank，作為用戶端事件處理常式，例如 OnClick="MyEvent()"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes, for example, target= _blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()". 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是`true`。Its default value is `true`. **重要**這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[圖表影像呈現](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). 設定此屬性; 時，可能需要使用特殊關鍵字每個關鍵字會被取代的資料適用的圖表項目從某個類型。Special keywords may be used when setting this property; each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element. 請參閱下表中的所有可用的關鍵字清單：Refer to the following table for a listing of all available keywords: |關鍵字Keyword|被取代Replaced by| |-------------|-----------------| |#VALX#VALX|資料點的 X 值。X-value of the data point.| |#VAL，#VALY，#VALY2，#VALY3...#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3…|資料點的 Y 值。Y-values of the data point.| |#SER#SER|數列名稱。Series name.| |#LABEL#LABEL|資料點標籤。Data point label.| |#INDEX#INDEX|資料點索引。Data point index.| |#PERCENT#PERCENT|百分比的資料點的 Y 值。Percentage of the data point Y-value.| |#TOTAL#TOTAL|數列中的所有 Y 值的總計。Total of all Y-values in the series.| |#LEGENDTEXT#LEGENDTEXT|圖例文字。Legend text.| 若要建立使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[圖表影像呈現](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color MarkerBorderColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定標記 (如果使用的話) 的框線色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.

value.span: 值，表示標記框線的 ARGB (Alpha、Red (紅)、Green (綠)、Blue (藍)) 色彩。

span.span: A value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用的標記，屬性以外的值為。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 請注意標記不會套用至圓形圖、 環圈圖，以及任何堆疊圖表類型。Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types. 針對自訂圖例屬性也會設定標記的框線色彩。For custom legends, the property will also set the border color of markers. 屬性設定的優先順序高於屬性設定。The property setting has precedence over the property setting. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerBorderWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標記 (如果使用) 的框線寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of the markers, if used.

summary.span: 以像素為單位。

span.span: Measured in pixels.
An value.

value.span: 預設值為一 (1) 個像素。

span.span: The default value is one (1) pixel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color MarkerColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定標記 (如果使用) 的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the markers, if used.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MarkerImage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定標記影像。

span.span: Gets or sets a marker image.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示影像檔，它可以是絕對或相對的 URL 路徑。Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要使用的標記，屬性以外的值為。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 屬性會優先於屬性。The property takes precedence over the property. 標記映像可以是任何支援的.NET Framework 中，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 若要設定一個標記影像透明色彩，請使用屬性。To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color MarkerImageTransparentColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定繪製標記影像時，會以透明色彩取代的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

value.span: 值，表示 ARGB (Alpha、紅、綠、藍) 色彩。

span.span: A value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來選取一種色彩將會顯示透明標記映像中。The property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent. 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目 (如果使用) 的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.

value.span: 運算式，表示標記繪圖區的高度與寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.
The default value is 5 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用的標記，屬性以外的值為。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 請注意標記不會套用到圓形圖、 環圈圖和任何堆疊的圖表類型的資料點。Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::MarkerStyle MarkerStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::MarkerStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::MarkerStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyleEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的標記樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a legend item marker style.

summary.span: 也可以用於啟用或停用標記的顯示。

span.span: Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.
A integer enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停用標記，請將此屬性設定為。To disable markers, set this property to . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會套用於物件與的其中一個或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

Public Overrides Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the legend item.
A value that represents the name of the legend item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PostBackValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可在 事件上處理的回傳值。

span.span: Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a event.

value.span: 值，表示傳遞給 事件的回傳值。

span.span: A value that represents the postback value passed to a event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color SeparatorColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目分隔符號的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.

value.span: 值，用於繪製圖例項目分隔符號的色彩。

span.span: A value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendSeparatorStyle SeparatorType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendSeparatorStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendSeparatorStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的分隔符號樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.
A enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SeriesName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與預設圖例項目關聯之 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 值，決定與預設圖例項目關聯之數列的名稱。

span.span: A value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.
The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只用在事件，以判斷預設圖例項目代表哪一個資料數列。This property should only be used in the event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents. 屬性會套用至圓形圖和範圍圖以外的所有圖表; 其預設圖例項目的對應來繪製資料點，且不繪製數列。The property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series. 當您處理圓形圖和範圍圖時，使用屬性改為。When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the property instead. 開發人員不應該設定這個屬性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SeriesPointIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與預設圖例項目關聯之 物件的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of a object associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 值，以零起始的索引表示預設圖例關聯之資料點的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.

value.span: 除了圓形圖與環圈圖以外的其他所有圖表類型，都會傳回負一 (-1)。

span.span: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只用在事件，以判斷預設圓形圖或球體圖表圖例項目所表示的物件。This property should only be used in the event to determine the object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry. 圖表類型而不是圓形圖或範圍圖表將會傳回負一 (-1)，因為預設圖例項目相對應繪製數列，而且不會進行繪製資料點。Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points. 使用這些屬性的圖表類型。Use the property for these chart types. 開發人員不應該設定這個屬性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定陰影色彩數個圖表項目，而且可以是設定為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用來達到 「 實際 」 遮蔽的效果。請嘗試使用"128,0,0,0"色彩的陰影。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要實作陰影，設定屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0). **請注意**，這個值只適用於物件與的其中一個或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadowOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.

value.span: 值，表示相關圖表項目的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要實作遮蔽，請使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值會導致往下及往右移位的陰影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 負值會導致向上和向左移位的陰影。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left. **請注意**，這個值只適用於物件與的其中一個或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.

value.span: 值，表示圖例項目工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定屬性，會自動建立用戶端影像地圖。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 對應區域也會建立具有其`Title`屬性設定為指定的工具提示字串。A map area will also be created with its `Title` attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 對應區域將會使用對應到標題的維度。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the title. 例如，如果屬性會設為資料點，則會在執行階段產生類似下列的 HTML 程式碼：For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: \\\\\\ 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[圖表影像呈現](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). 這個屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[關鍵字](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). 若要建立使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的目的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL of a legend item.

value.span: 值，表示圖例項目的目的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL of a legend item.

value.span: 若要使用絕對 URL，字串運算式的開頭請使用 "http://" 或 "www."。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字串的開頭不是上述其中一個前置詞，則會將字串視為相對 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定這個屬性，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 對應區域也會建立它的 HREF 屬性設定為指定的錨點或 URL。A map area will also be created with its HREF attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 此對應區域也會使用對應到相關的圖表元素的維度。This map area will also use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如，如果屬性會設為資料點，則會在執行階段產生類似下列的 HTML 程式碼：For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: \...\\\\...\\\ 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 例如，目標屬性的對應 box-decoration-break，= _Blank，可以使用來自指定屬性。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, TARGET=_Blank, can be specified by using the property. 屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱關鍵字 （Chart 控制項）。For more information, see Keywords (Chart Controls). 若要建立使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[圖表影像呈現](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .
